navbar.navHeadline: Aalborg's first online zero waste store

section1.heading: Aalborg’s first online zero waste store
section1.paragraph: The best local products, delivered to your door

section2.heading: The zero-waste store you can adjust to your needs
section2.step2: 2. Choose delivery type - delivery of self-pickup
section2.step3: 3. Choose how often you want to receive the items
section2.step4: 4. Get fresh homemade products delivered in reusable containers
section2.step5: 5. Exchange empty containers for filled ones on the next delivery

section3.heading: Homemade food and homegrown produce in a convenient subscription
section3.paragraph1: We bring all the benefits of farmers’ market shopping to you in a new, convenient form: order fresh produce and dried goods and have them delivered in reusable containers on a regular basis.
section3.button1: Find out about our methods and values
section3.paragraph2: All our homemade products are made with ingredients sourced from farmers in the Aalborg area. We take great care to ensure your food is organic, free from pesticides and grown with love and care.

section4.heading: The team with a passion
section4.paragraph: Zerodottir is the next step on our mission to spread our love for homemade, natural and organic plant-based food and products.

section5.heading: Zerodottir blog
section5.paragraph: Visit our blog for helpful tips, inspiration and news!

section6.heading: Meet us at Vegandottir
section6.paragraph1: Still not convinced? Visit our cozy food truck Vegandottir at Rat & Godt and have a try of our assortment of homemade plant-based food!
section6.paragraph2: Or, if you already tried our food, browse our specialties you already know and love.

section7.heading: Got questions?
section7.paragraph: If you think we still haven’t answered your questions, or you think we could collaborate and make something great together - get in touch!
